info.title: Fridge Magnets
info.author: Paul Overy
info.details:
Move magnetic letters about, bit of fun and learning for children
Up to 4 Controllers: 
Shake Wiimote to shake letters
Scroll view with direction buttons
(A or B) Hold down to pick up
(A and B)  Drop new Letter
(1)      Remove highlighted letter
(2)      Pile up letters
(-)/(+)  Change camera view zoom
(Home)   Back to Homebrew Channel
